title: FAKE Alert: Don’t believe this morphed picture of CPI(M) leader Sitaram Yechury | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
A picture of CPI(M) leader Sitaram Yechury is doing the rounds on the internet in which he can be seen with a big placard. The text on the placard suggests that Yechury and his party are slamming the Indian Army and supporting China.

The text on the placard read: “Indian Army Down Down. We support to China Zindabad.”

This comes following ‘one of the bloodiest’ clashes between India and China at the Galwan valley in Ladakh on the night of June 15-16 in which 20 Indian soldiers were martyred.

ALSO READ: Fact Check: Are Japanese boycotting products from the US since 1945?…

NewsMobile fact-checked the above picture and found it to be FAKE.

On putting the picture through Reverse Image Search, we came across the original picture on the official Twitter handle of CPI(M) (@cpimspeak).
